Aug. 22, 1931 D Birtley Selection Contest
Birtley Selection Contest 0 Test Piece Contest Birtley Contest birtley-contest
None
The Golden Age
Birtley, County Durham Prizes - 1st £7.10s. and cup, 2nd £3.10s., 3rd £1.10s., 4th 10s March contest(own choice) - 1st(£1) Brancepeth, 2nd(10s.) Thornley. Promoted by Birtley British Legion. 5 bands competed.
Oct. 29, 2013, 9:15 a.m. Dec. 16, 2018, 3:54 p.m.
1 Blyth LNER G. J. C. Ritchie
2 Thornley Colliery Edward Kitto
3 Brancepeth Welfare Band J. B. Wright
4 Urpeth Colliery J. Young
5 Lumley 6th Colliery Unknown
